{{ja-na|むじょうけん}}

====Usage notes====
The use of the particle {{m|ja|な|tr=na}} to make this into an adjective appears to be a relatively recent innovation. This term is listed in many dictionaries<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref><ref name="SMK5">{{R:Shinmeikai5}}</ref> only as a noun, which may be used with the particle {{m|ja|の|tr=no|pos=genitive or possessive}} to modify a following noun. As such, the form {{lang|ja|無条件な}} might be viewed as [[proscribed]] in more formal contexts.
